title: Block syncing log output and metrics stopped
body:
# üêû Bug Report

### Description

Log output of block syncing suddenly has stopped on an Altona node. However sync still seems to be running as the validators still attest correctly. Peer count is as expected.

Also the internal metrics seem to be affected, beacon_clock_time_slot on the prometheus interface stopped as well.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18283997/87096799-eba0c200-c243-11ea-8da0-59025fd10ab7.png)

